attributes.action: STOP THE E PETITIONS TEAM FROM CENSORING E PETITIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: APPARENTLY AN E PETITION WILL ONLY BE PUBLISHED IF IT MEETS THE POLITICALLY CORRECT CRITERIA SET BY THE E PETITIONS TEAM. NORMAL EVERYDAY LANGUAGE USED IN A NORMAL DESCRIPTIVE WAY WILL BE CENSORED IN A PETITION IF THE PETITION SUBJECT DOES NOT MEET THE PC RULES OF THAT TEAM. I REQUEST THE PM TO DEAL WITH THIS

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
